name: follicular dendritic cell sarcoma
definition: A dendritic cell sarcoma cancer that effects the follicular dendritic cells. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Follicular_dendritic_cell_sarcoma]

clinicalTrials.title: A Phase 2 Study of Pembrolizumab in Patients With Histiocyte/Dendritic Cell Neoplasms and Biologically Selected Subtypes of Relapsed/Refractory Aggressive Lymphomas
